message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?

I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your new offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?

I understand that you're looking to save as much as possible, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $105. I've already compromised quite a bit, and I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you halfway from your new offer, so I'll offer $102.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $102.50?

I understand that you're trying to make one last offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $108. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
